title: structAppend
name: structAppend
description: Appends all the data from struct2 into struct2, replacing duplicate keys unless specified by the overwrite flag

arguments.name: Struct1
arguments.description: Structure to which struct2 is appended.

arguments.name: Struct2
arguments.description: Structure that contains the data to append to struct1

arguments.name: OverwriteFlag
arguments.description: - true (default): values in struct2 overwrite corresponding values in struct1.
